tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Nirmala Lahoti is  very experienced *** ************* ******* I had a head injury and went to her for consultation after getting my CT. She examined me thoroughly and explained the line of treatmen. I am more then happy to have visited her.  I feel very confident after visiting her as she has given me great confidence. Thanks Dr. Lahoti.

tags: None
review:
Doctor prescribed EEG test and assure to provide report within four hours but provided after ten hours.
There is clean report but doctor told cyst is problematic even after clean report and write medicine for lifetime. Said this is not curable.
And told to visit after a week.
If this is incurable and medicine will go on lifetime then why asking to revisit after a week.
This shows only bad practice.
reply_text: Patient was called to review the effect of medicine after a week as there can be side effects like insomnia behavioural problems  etc.Doses are also to be adjusted..EEG report is complimentory to clinical diagnosis and not 100%diagnostic tool.Since MRI shows a lesion in that area which could be correlated with the clinical presentation the diagnosis was made.Every thing can not be solved like maths.Years of experience is also required.Purpose of discussion in details is to educate patient regarding the problem and not scaring.Even if life long treatment is prescribed monitoring of the patient is required.Most of the centres do not give results reports instantly.I hope I could satisy your queries.Iwill be most happy to answer to your queries i f required in future too.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Nirmala Lahoti is incredible. 

She combines expertise and a willingness to listen and discuss.

She explained everything in a very clear manner. She was also kind, friendly, and lovely to speak with at every appointment. 

It‚Äôs very rare to find a doctor that combines such personal touches and care for a patient as a person with an outstanding quality of medical care. 

I highly recommend Dr. Nirmala Lahoti!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: The experience with doctor Nirmala g was very grateful she had explained every thing very nicely about my head pain. She talk me very friendly. She gave me **** treatment which I have got relief from it.                                                                    Thank you

tags: None
review:
Very bad experience. , charges are not relevant. Even I got second appointment and wait for 2 hrs  upto 10 pm. And she charged 500 with statement that go to Dermotologist.  No benefit in my problem. That's really useless overpriced doctors. But medicine was not so costly.
Thanks
reply_text:
WE  ARE EXTREMELY SORRY FOR THE WAITING PERIOD.I MUST HAVE GOT STUCK IN SOME EMERGENCY SOMEWHERE.IF YOU WISH TO CONSULT ME AGAIN I AM ALWAYS THERE TO REVIEW THE CASE AND GUIDE YOU.
REGARDS.

tags: None
review: Went to meet the doctor, ******* ******* *** *** ******** *** *** ****** ** *** ******* ****** paid her fee of 1100 there only. Then patient was asked to consult a dermatogist on video call in her own clinic there was no mention of additional charges at that time. I was charged 500 more for the consultation with dermatologist whose creditionials and effectiveness i am unsure of. where as on practo consultation fee was shown only 1100. Then patient was asked to undero 4 tests..all tests showed negative results. **** ******* ****** ********** *** **** ******** ******* *** ****** ****** ** **** ******* ******* ** *** * ********* ****** **** ***** ***** ** ******* ***** ******** ************ ** ***** *** ****** ** * ***** *********

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited for my Sister's chronic throat pain issue who is also a special Child, *** **** ** *** ******* ****** *** ***** *** *** ********* ****** ** ****** *** ** ***** she refused to check my sister's throat ******** and told us to capture the photograph of her throat and send her in WhatsApp and when sister was elaborating about her Condition , she was openly contradicting my sister's opinion and said it's all her misunderstanding and she was in delusion , at the same time when my sister was coughing due to severe throat pain she has openly told my father to make her sit outside her cabin and gives the prescription to my father, same day at night after my sister had taken her medicine prescribed by the Doctor, *** ****** ******* ********* ****** ***** **** *** ****** ** ******** ********** *** *** ** *** ** ****** *** *** **** ** ***** ** ** ****** *********
